Sentencas: Recently, Fe-based perovskite oxides, such as Ln(1-x)Sr(x)FeO(3-delta) (Ln = La, Pr, Nd, Sm, Eu) have been proposed as potential alternative electrode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), due to their good phase stability, electrocatalytic activity, and low cost.
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: This work presents the catalytic effect of BaCO3 nanoparticles modified on a cobalt-free La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-delta-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (LSF-GDC) composite cathode at an intermediate-temperature (IT)-SOFC.
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: An electrochemical conductivity relaxation investigation (ECR) shows that the K-chem value of the modified LSF-GDC improves up to a factor of 17.47, demonstrating that the oxygen reduction process is effectively enhanced after surface impregnation by BaCO3.
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The area-specific resistance (ASR) of the LSF-GDC cathode, modified with 9.12 wt.% BaCO3, is 0.1 omega.cm(2) at 750 degrees C, which is about 2.2 times lower than that of the bare cathode (0.22 omega.cm(2)).
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: As a result, the anode-supported single cells, with the modified LSF-GDC cathode, deliver a high peak power density of 993 mW/cm(2) at 750 degrees C, about 39.5% higher than that of the bare cell (712 mW/cm(2)).
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The single cells based on the modified cathode also displayed good performance stability for about 100 h at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles

Sentencas: This study demonstrates the effectiveness of BaCO3 nanoparticles for improving the performance of IT-SOFC cathode materials.
Titulo: Enhanced Performance of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-δ-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Surface Modification with BaCO3 Nanoparticles
